segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar, and it's making me a bit nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to lose his balance any moment, which is scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie, and she seems a bit nervous too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's surprising how no one is paying attention to the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the surprising chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself, but it's surprising no one is helping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it's surprising no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will help him if he starts to fall, but she seems just as surprised as I am.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's dress is getting wet, but she doesn't even notice, which is surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just full of unnoticed dangers and surprising carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
